## AlRoute.getActivationCursorFlat() method

This method uses the method above to generate a flat array of activated menu items, from top to bottom, or undefined if no child of the given menu is activated.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getActivationCursorFlat(): AlRoute[] | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`AlRoute[] | undefined`
